text: An insider has revealed that the secret ingredient in Coca Cola is ______.

How do I take out my frustration?

I really hated ______ at work. So I took care of it with ______.
In hindsight, ______ at a child's birthday party was probably a bad idea.
Not only could Jesus turn water into wine, but he could also turn ______ into ______.

Our story begins with a young boy, his canine companion, and ______.

What's the best way to describe me?

Without ______, life would be a mistake.
______. I drink that. ______. I spit that. ______. I watch that. But I'm not a rapper.
